pages.text: $(li)The Cage is a block that allows you to trap small creatures inside.$(br)$(li)To capture a new creature you have to right click a creature while you are holding an empty Cage in your hand.

$(li)You can place the cage like other common block shift right clicking while you are holding the Cage in the desired place to show your trapped creature.$(br)$(li)To release it, just right click while you are holding the cage with the trapped creature inside and you are pointing to the block where it will be released.
